title: 4 Simple Ways to Find Your Phone Number on an iPhone

steps.title: Open Settings.
steps.content: Open Settings. It's the app with gray cogs on one of your home screens. If you donâ€™t see it on your home screen, check the App Library.

steps.title: Tap Apps.
steps.content: Tap Apps . If you haven't updated to iOS 18, skip this step.

steps.title: Tap Phone.
steps.content: Tap Phone . This is next to a green phone icon.

steps.title: View your phone number.
steps.content: View your phone number. Your number can be found next to My Number , near the center of the screen.

steps.title: Open the Contacts app.
steps.content: Open the Contacts app. This looks like a person icon with colored tabs on the right side. If the app opens to a contact , tap the back arrow in the top-left corner. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap My Card.
steps.content: Tap My Card . This is at the very top. You should see your name and Apple account picture. [2] X Research source

steps.title: View your phone number.
steps.content: View your phone number. Your number can be found underneath your contact, in the home tile.

steps.title: Plug your iOS device to your computer.
steps.content: Plug your iOS device to your computer. Use the cable that came with your device or another data cable. If prompted, unlock your device and tap Allow to allow permission to connect.

steps.title: Open the Finder.
steps.content: Open the Finder . You can find this in your dock. [3] X Research source If you have macOS Mojave or earlier, open iTunes .

steps.title: Click your device.
steps.content: Click your device. You'll see it listed underneath Locations in the left panel. Your device details will open. If you're using iTunes, click the Summary tab to view its information.

steps.title: View your phone number.
steps.content: View your phone number. You can find this underneath your device name.

steps.title: Plug your iPhone into your computer.
steps.content: Plug your iPhone into your computer. Use the cable that came with your device or another data cable. [4] X Research source If prompted, unlock your device and tap Allow to allow permission to connect.

steps.title: Launch iTunes.
steps.content: Launch iTunes. iTunes is available to download from the Apple website.

steps.title: Click the phone icon.
steps.content: Click the phone icon. When your device is connected, you'll see the phone icon in the top-left corner, next to the Music drop-down menu. Your device details will open.

steps.title: View your phone number.
steps.content: View your phone number. You can find this underneath your device name.
